Reviews.Title: “Horrible Hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: m3resources Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: couple review coming pretty conservative perspective researched online hours read reviews am baffled hotel received reviews arrived stuff quickly left bed mattresses pushed cot middle divider bathroom tiny shower toilet sink tiny walls extremely thin hear people talk hours night night cleaning looked nicer inquired switch 10am booked guest simply roomthey conveniently didnt speak english disappointing hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Concorde
